Behavioral Action Space

Control Action Space

Distribute Fees

The action for distributing fees earned from relays and sessions.

Constraints:

Policies

Distribute Fees Policy

The aggregate policy for determining what fees are allocated where. For a more detailed version of the policy, one can look here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QYe6NzuiyimsXs5cT1BSM-UT1DtX_K38cOZsEFJOtdA/edit#gid=242780369

Preceded By:

1. Distribute Fees

Domain Spaces:

1. Distribute Fees Space

Followed By:

1. Decrease Relay Fees

2. Modify Validator POKT Holdings

3. Modify DAO POKT Holdings

Codomain Spaces:

1. Decrease Relay Fees Space

2. Modify Validator POKT Space

3. Modify DAO POKT Space

Constraints:

Mechanisms

Decrease Relay Fees

The mechanism which disburses the relay fees collected

Preceded By:

1. Distribute Fees Policy

Domain Spaces:

1. Decrease Relay Fees Space

State Updates:

1. Global.Relay Fees

Constraints:

Logic:

The relay fees decrease by the POKT amount

Modify Validator POKT Holdings

The mechanism to update the personal holdings of a validator

Preceded By:

1. Validator Block Reward Policy

2. Distribute Fees Policy

Domain Spaces:

1. Modify Validator POKT Space

State Updates:

1. Validator.POKT Holdings

Constraints:

Logic:

The validator at DOMAIN[0].public_key has its POKT Holdings modified by DOMAIN[0].value

Modify DAO POKT Holdings

The mechanism to update the holdings of the DAO

Preceded By:

1. DAO Block Reward Policy

2. Distribute Fees Policy

Domain Spaces:

1. Modify DAO POKT Space

State Updates:

1. DAO.POKT Holdings

Constraints:

Logic:

The DAO has its holdings increased by the value

Parameters

dao_fee_percentage

validator_fee_percentage
